attributes.action: Enforce action on illegal parking  including disabled drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Illegal parking. Disabled people with a blue badge should not get away with parking illegally. Traffic wardens and police fail to implement fines etc because of the fear of bad publicity. Many disabled Drivers Park in illegal places causing dangerous situations.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to your local authority.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
